column2: "Na iyi nye adze a fa yɛ hɔn fa tsew hɔn ho
column3: na wondzi m'asɔfoe: fa nantwisaa eburwa kor nye nguannyin ebien a wonndzi dzɛm
column6: nye epitsi tatar a wɔdze ngo aforɔw
column7: na epitsi tatar ntrɛtraba a wɔasera ho ngo: ewifua pa isiam na fa yɛ."

column2: "Na fa gu kɛntsɛn kor mu
column3: na ongu kɛntsɛn no mu ma fa bra
column4: ɔnye nantwisaa no nye nguannyin ebien no."

column2: "Na fa Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no bra ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano
column3: na fa nsu hohor hɔn ho."

column2: "Na fa ntar no
column3: na fa sortar no
column4: nye egugudo ne bataker no
column7: na fa egugudo abɔdo a wɔawen no nkyermu no bɔ no mu:"

column2: "na fa asɔfokyɛw no soa no
column3: na fa kyɛw krɔnkrɔn no si asɔfokyɛw no do."

column2: "Na nkyii fa ɔserango no
column3: na hue gu ne tsir do
column4: na fa sera no."

column2: "Na fa ne mbabanyin no bra
column3: na hyehyɛ hɔn ntar."

column2: "Na fa abɔdo bobɔ hɔn mu
column3: Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no
column4: na bobɔ hɔn mbɔtsir: na wonnya asɔfodzi no nyɛ hɔndze dɛ daa ahyɛdze; na tu Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no si nkyɛn."

column2: "Na fa ɔnantwisaa no bra ehyiadzibuw no enyim: na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no mfa hɔn nsa ngu nantwisaa no etsifi."
"Na ku nantwisaa no wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano."

column2: "Na fa nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa bi
column3: na fa wo nsatseaba bɔ mu sera afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn ho; na hue bɔgya no nyinara gu afɔrmbukyia no ase."

column2: "Na yi seradze a ɔkata ayamudze no ho nyinara
column3: nye dza ɔsensɛn berɛbo no ho no
column4: nye nsɛbea ebien no
column5: nye seradze a ɔwɔ do no
column6: na hyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na ɔnantwisaa no ne nam
column3: nye no nwoma
column4: nye n'egyanan dze
column5: fa gya hyew no wɔ nseraban no ekyir: ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Eso fa oguannyin kor; na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no mfa hɔn nsa ngu n'etsifi."
"Na ku oguannyin no
column3: na fa no bɔgyaa
column4: na fa petse afɔrmbukyia no ho hyia."

column2: "Na twitwa oguannyin no esinesin
column3: na hohor n'ayamudze
column4: nye no ntwɛr ho
column6: na ɔnye ne tsir no ho."

column2: "Na hyew oguannyin no no nyinara wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: ɔyɛ ɔhyew afɔr ma EWURADZE: ɔyɛ adze huanhuam
column3: afɔr a wɔdze gya bɔ ma EWURADZE a."

column2: "Na fa oguannyin kor no so; na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no mfa hɔn nsa ngu oguannyin no etsifi."
"Na nkyii ku oguannyin no
column3: na fa no mbɔgyaa bi
column4: na fa ka Aaron n'aso nyimfa ano
column5: nye ne mbabanyin no hɔn aso nyimfa ano
column6: nye hɔn nsa nyimfa kokrobetsir ano
column7: nye hɔn anan nyimfa kokrobetsir ano
column8: na fa bɔgya no petse afɔrmbukyia no ho hyia."

column2: "Na fa afɔrmbukyia no do bɔgya no bi
column3: nye ɔserango no bi
column4: na fa petse Aaron do
column7: nye ne mbabanyin no hɔn ntar do ka no ho
column8: ma ɔntsew ɔno nye ne ntar
column10: nye ne mbabanyin no hɔn ntar ho nka no ho."

column2: "Nkyii so fa oguannyin no ne seradze
column3: nye ne seradze dua no
column4: nye seradze a ɔkata n'ayamudze ho no
column5: nye adze a ɔsensɛn ne mberɛbo ho no
column8: nye aserɛ nyimfa dze no; osiandɛ ɔyɛ etuhoakyɛ oguannyin:"

column2: "na boodoo ntɔwmu kor
column3: nye boodoo tatar a woegu mu ngo kor
column4: nye tatar trɛtraba kor
column5: fa fi epitsi kɛntsɛn no a osi EWURADZE enyim no mu:"

column2: "na fa ne nyina gu Aaron nsamu
column3: nye ne mbabanyin no nsamu; na hihim no yɛ EWURADZE enyim ohim afɔr."

column2: "Na gyegye no wɔ hɔn nsamu
column3: na hyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do wɔ ɔhyew afɔr no do
column4: ma ɔnyɛ EWURADZE enyim adze huanhuam: ɔyɛ afɔr a wɔdze gya bɔ ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na fa Aaron n'etuhoakyɛ oguannyin no ne nyan
column3: na hihim yɛ EWURADZE enyim ohim afɔr: na ɔnyɛ wo kyɛpɛn."

column2: "Na ohim afɔr nyan no
column3: na ɔmado afɔr aserɛ no a wɔdze fi Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no hɔn etuhoakyɛ oguannyin no a woehihim no
column4: na wɔama do no mu no tsew ho:"

column2: "na ɔnyɛ dɛ daa ndzinoa mfi Israelmba nsamu mma Aaron nye ne mbabanyin: na ɔyɛ ɔmado afɔr: na ɔnyɛ ɔmado afɔr mfa mfi Israelmba hɔn asomdwee afɔr n'afɔrbɔdze mu
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn ɔmado afɔr a wɔbɔ ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Aaron ne ntar krɔnkrɔn no nyɛ ne mba a wodzi n'ekyir dze
column3: ma wɔnsera hɔn ngo wɔ mu
column4: na wontu hɔn nsi nkyɛn wɔ mu."

column2: "Nda esuon na ɔbabanyin a odzi ɔsɔfo wɔ n'ananmu no nhyɛ
column3: aber a ɔreba ehyiadzibuw no mu abɔsom wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no."

column2: "Na fa etuhoakyɛ oguannyin no
column3: na noa ne nam no wɔ bea a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no ndzi oguannyin no ne nam
column3: nye boodoo a ɔwɔ kɛntsɛn no mu no
column4: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano."

column2: "Na wondzi ndzɛmba no a wɔdze yɛɛ mpata
column3: ma wɔdze eetu hɔn esi nkyɛn
column4: na wɔatsew hɔnho no: mbom mma nyimpa biara nndzi bi

column2: "Na sɛ etuhoakyɛ nam no
column3: anaa boodoo no bi ka ma adze kye do a
column4: ɔno fa gya hyew dza aka no: mma wonndzi

column2: "Na dɛm na fa yɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ wo no nyinara: nda esuon na tu hɔn si nkyɛn."
"Na daa nyina fa nantwisaa bɔ bɔn ho afɔr no ma ɔnyɛ mpatadze: na tsew afɔrmbukyia no ho
column3: aber a erepata wɔ ne tsir no; na sera ho ngo
column4: fa tsew ho."

column2: "Nda esuon na pata wɔ afɔrmbukyia no ne tsir
column3: na tsew ho: na afɔrmbukyia no nyɛ krɔnkrɔn mu krɔnkrɔn; biribiara a ɔka afɔrmbukyia no ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Afei iyi nye dza fa bɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do; daa daa nyina nguambaa ebien a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia."
"Eguambaa kor na fa bɔ afɔr anapa; na eguambaa kor so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir:"
"na fa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor a wɔdze ngo siwii bɔdambɔ kor na fa ebupɛn anan mu kor aforɔw; na wenyin bɔdambɔ kor na fa ebupɛn anan mu kor a ɔyɛ nom afɔr
column3: ka eguambaa kor ho."

column2: "Na eguambaa kor no so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir
column3: na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ anapa edzidzi afɔr no
column4: na mbrɛ no nom afɔr no tse
column6: afɔr a wɔdze gya bɔ ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Ɔnyɛ daa ɔhyew afɔr wɔ w'ebusuasantsen mu wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano wɔ EWURADZE enyim: mbrɛ menye hom behyia
column3: makasa wɔ hɔ makyerɛ wo."

column2: "Na hɔ na menye Israelmba behyia; na m'enyimnyam atsew Buw no ho."
"Na mebɛtsew ehyiadzibuw no
column3: nye afɔrmbukyia no ho: Aaron so nye ne mbabanyin no mebɛtsew hɔn ho
column4: ma woeedzi m'asɔfoe."

column2: "Na mebɛtsena Israelmba no mu
column3: na mayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do bae
column3: dɛ mebɛtsena hɔn mu no: emi nye EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."
